fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Totally Morb on someone during the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You are rich, and have Morbty Morbillion Dollars in the Box Office.
- Morbius was a Box Office Success, and everyone likes you. You cannot be lynched.
- I LOVE MORBIUS!!!!! üòç üòçüòç
